title: Public Site (React)
body: A high-performance React + Vite application. It acts as a headless CMS frontend, dynamically rendering pages and blocks based on JSON configurations fetched from the backend.

title: Core Backend (NestJS)
body: The central nervous system. Handles tenant resolution, serves static assets (CSS/Images) via proxy, and provides API endpoints for content retrieval.

title: Admin Panel (Angular)
body: The legacy frontend, now repurposed as a dedicated back-office interface for content managers to edit JSON files and site settings.
